segments.name: iPhone
key_points: Active installed base surpassed 1 billion devices
98% customer satisfaction for iPhone 12 family
Strong demand for iPhone 12 family
Growth despite COVID-19 impact on retail locations

segments.name: Services
key_points: Over 620 million paid subscriptions
All-time records in App Store, Cloud Services, Music, Advertising, AppleCare, Payment Services
First quarter of Apple One bundle
Added more than 35 million subscriptions sequentially
Up 140 million paid subscriptions year-over-year
90% of US stores now accept Apple Pay

segments.name: Mac
key_points: Strong demand for M1-powered MacBook Air, MacBook Pro, and Mac mini
93% customer satisfaction rating
All-time records in Europe and Rest of Asia Pacific
December quarter records in Americas, Greater China, and Japan
Around half of purchases from new-to-Mac customers

segments.name: iPad
key_points: Strong double-digit growth in all regions
All-time record in Japan
94% customer satisfaction rating
Around half of purchases from new-to-iPad customers
Strong demand in current working and learning environments
Successful launch of new iPad Air

segments.name: Wearables, Home and Accessories
key_points: Now size of Fortune 120 company
All-time revenue records in every geographic segment
75% of Apple Watch buyers were first-time purchasers
Strong holiday demand for Apple Watch, AirPods lineup, and HomePod mini
Launch of Fitness+

expectations.revenue: Growth to accelerate year-over-year, follow typical seasonality
expectations.services: Faces tougher year-over-year comparison due to elevated activity last year
expectations.wearables: Year-over-year growth expected to decelerate compared to Q1

strategic_initiatives: Racial Equity & Justice Initiative with $100 million commitment
Launch of Propel Center with $25 million commitment
New Apple Developer Academy in Detroit
Progress on $350 billion US investment commitment
